query:
SELECT 
  ii.id as item_id,
  ii.environment_id,
  COUNT(ist.id) as num_steps,
  GROUP_CONCAT(ist.step_name ORDER BY ist.step_order) as step_names
FROM inspection_items ii
LEFT JOIN installation_steps ist ON ii.id = ist.inspection_item_id
GROUP BY ii.id
LIMIT 10;
